# early_access_tips.txt

Content-Type: text/x-zim-wiki
Wiki-Format: zim 0.6
Creation-Date: 2024-08-15T21:59:54-07:00

====== early access tips.txt ======
ﾂ表tInclude something important in each update's feature set to encourage playing it
ﾂ表tPrivate forum for beta should include ideas, questions, and problems sections.
ﾂ表tOpen beta should be reserved for further polish and bug fixes. 
ﾂ表tMake sure the game is modular. Easy for the community to modify. Add a Steam workshop.
